LanguageData.QE_VatGrowerStartCraftingGizmoDescriptio: Select an organ to grow. Colonists will begin filling the vat with the required ingredients.
LanguageData.QE_VatGrowerStopCraftingGizmoDescription: Stops the growing process. Refunds inserted ingredients if the process was not started.
LanguageData.QE_CustomNameCompGizmoDescription: Sets a custom name which can be easily indentifiable.
LanguageData.QE_VatGrowerGenomesHint: No available genomes. Get them by making 'Genome Sequencers' in machining tables, then use them.
LanguageData.QE_AlertMaintenanceRequiredExplanation: These growers require maintenance or they will lose what they are growing and materials will be wasted!\n\nSend a doctor or researcher to maintain at once.
LanguageData.QE_LetterHumanlikeGrownDescription: Welcome vatgrown clone {0} to the colony!\n\nYou can either train them up from scratch with the help of their natural affinities or apply a Brain scan template on them to give them a skillset right away.
LanguageData.QE_BrainScanningRejectInput: {0} was rejected because no valid bed could be found.
LanguageData.QE_OrganGrowthDurationTooltip: Higher values = more time required to grow organs. Default = 100%
LanguageData.QE_OrganIngredientMultTooltip: Higher values = more ingredients required to grow organs. Default = 100%
LanguageData.QE_CloneGrowthDurationTooltip: Higher values = more time required to grow clones. Default = 100%
LanguageData.QE_CloneIngredientMultTooltip: Higher values = more ingredients required to grow clones. Default = 100%
LanguageData.QE_VatMaintTimeTooltip: Higher values = maintenance required less frequently. Default = 100%
